# **Natural Resources Canada - Financial Management and Accounting Services**
## **Contract Information**
### **Reference Number**
* cb-869-18629168
### **Solicitation Number**
* NRCan-5000074680
### **Revision Number**
* Amendment 1
### **Publication Date**
* May 13, 2024
### **Tender Closing Date**
* June 13, 2024 (14:00:00)
## **Project Overview**
Natural Resources Canada is soliciting proposals for a five-year contract, including option periods, for the provision of Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) under the Professional Audit Support Services Supply Arrangement (SA). The contract will be awarded on an “as and when requested” basis.
## **Scope of Work**
The successful contractor will provide professional audit services for Stream 3: Information Technology and Systems Audits, and Stream 6: Financial Accounting Services. These services will be provided to meet the requirements of the Treasury Board Policy on Financial Management.
## **Evaluation Criteria**
The proposal evaluation will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. The evaluation process will be conducted in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Standing Offer Agreement.
## **Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
